description:

description:
BIODERMA ATODERM Creme Ultra-Nourishing - Moisturizer For Normal To Sensitive ,Paraben Free, fragrance free and strengthens the skin barrier.

CETAPHIL, A gentle and non-greasy moisturizer that provides long-lasting hydration without clogging pores or causing irritation. It is suitable for both face and body and is free from fragrance and lanolin.

essentials:
• Look for "Oil-Free" or "Non-Comedogenic" Formulas

  • Look for ingredients like hyaluronic acid, glycerin, or niacinamide
  • Avoid Heavy or Thick Formulas
  • Gel-Based Formulas
